description: A failed International Obfuscated C Code Contest entry.  See the included README for spoilers.
name: 1k-codec

description: This script lets you snooze emails in your Gmail; the email is archived, but will reappear in a set number of days. If you use Inbox Zero, you might like this a lot.  Based on <http://gmailblog.blogspot.ca/2011/07/gmail-snooze-with-apps-script.html>
name: gmail-snooze

description: My window manager, forked from dwm.  My changes don't merge easily into newer versions, so I'm stuck on 5.5.  dwm itself is hosted at <http://dwm.suckless.org>
name: my-dwm

description: My fork of OpenITG, with some minor but important changes, mostly for the UW DDR Club.
name: openitg

description: Use your favourite text editor to rename files! I wrote this program a long time ago, but I still use it all the time. Also, I last felt the need to modify it in 2011, so I guess it counts as a mature program.
name: ren

description: Scripts which generate a webpage to compare your SpaceChem solutions with the best on SolutionNet, or with your chosen rival(s).
name: spacechem

description: Advanced rhythm game for Windows, Linux and OS X. Designed for both home and arcade use.
name: stepmania

description: Scripts and custom puzzles for the game TIS-100.
name: tis100
